title: indhukEmi sEthu
sahitya:
indukEmi sEtu mamma krSNuDentO mATalADa namma



caraNam 1



maguvalanTE intavAdA kSNa mAnamE prANamu gAdA



caraNam 2



gusa gusalandEmi vaccu ippuDu suruNTE Uru bOvaccu



caraNam 3



vanitala gani evvaraina krSNa vancanagA balka tagunA



caraNam 4



hatamu sEya vElagAdu Atma hatya gAni vErE lEdu



caraNam 5



nagnamug  nilva vashamA krSNa nalugurilo nIku yashamA



caraNam 6



nA mATalu vini mIru vEga nanu gaTTu jErpa bOnIru



caraNam 7



lalanala pApamu lEmO IlAgu vrataluNDE nEmO



caraNam 8



velaku tIsina valapu rAdu gAnaveladula ika namma rAdu



caraNam 9



rAjanya iTu enca valadu tyAgarAjavinuta prEma galadu
